Title: Selecting Products on Douyin
Content: Selecting products on Douyin can be a straightforward process, especially for those looking to sell high-ticket or quality items. Start by determining the type of products you want to sell. Once decided, use Douyin to search for relevant products. For example, if you are interested in accessories, search for terms like 'earrings' or 'necklaces.' Look for accounts that specialize in these products and analyze their content. Focus on accounts that use real-life images and avoid those with real person appearances to prevent copyright issues. Check the prices and sales volume of their products to gauge their popularity. Copy the successful products and their content style, but make sure to modify the names and images to avoid direct copying. This method allows you to leverage existing successful products and content styles without spending too much time on product research.

Title: Using Pinduoduo for Product Verification
Content: After identifying potential products on Douyin, use Pinduoduo to verify and source these products. Take screenshots of the products you are interested in and search for them on Pinduoduo. Compare the prices and ensure that the products are the same. This step helps you find the best deals and ensures that you can offer competitive prices. For instance, if a product is sold for 29.8 yuan on Douyin, you can price it similarly or slightly lower on your platform. This strategy ensures that you remain competitive while maintaining a good profit margin. Additionally, avoid products with real person appearances to prevent copyright issues. By using Pinduoduo for product verification, you can confidently select products that are likely to perform well on your platform.

Title: Leveraging Douyin's Selection Alliance
Content: Douyin's Selection Alliance is a valuable tool for finding trending products. This feature provides real-time updates on popular products across various categories. To use this tool, navigate to the Selection Alliance and explore the 'Hot Selling List' or use the search function to find specific products. For example, if you are interested in fashion accessories, you can filter the results to show only those items. The Selection Alliance also provides related videos and topics, which can be useful for creating engaging content. By leveraging this tool, you can identify products that are currently popular and have a high chance of success on your platform. This method saves time and ensures that you are always up-to-date with the latest trends.
